narrative.narrative: Canadian Airways Congo is a domestic carrier of the Republic of Congo and is based at Brazzaville. It was founded in 2004. From Brazzaville it flies to Impfondo,Pointe-Noire,and Ouesso. It has an MD-81 as of around June 2016 that it got in 2012. It has used a 727 in the past as well. It has nothing of note to do with Canada or a Canadian company.
